MSGNO: 2191058
please propose for:-
MV DELINA (IMABARI 38 /'19) - WEDA, INDONESIA  2/5 SEPT
MV PAGODA (IMABARI LOGGER 28K/'13)   HULUDAO, N.CHINA   5/8 SEPT
+++
MV DELINA
37,976 MTS DWAT AT 10.54M SSW
IMABARI 2019, BULK CARRIER, LIBERIA FLAG, CLASS NKK
LOA 179.97M / BEAM 29.80M - 5 HO/HA
GRT 23,232 / NRT 12,101
GRAIN / BALE CAP 46,994 / 45,238 CBM
4 X 30 TONS CRANES
S/C: 14.0KTS(B)/13.5KTS(L) ON 18.0(B)/18.0(L) MTS VLSFO
ECO (WOG): 12.5KTS(B)/12.0KTS(L) ON 14.0(B)/15.0(L) MTS VLSFO
: 2.5 MT VLSFO AT PORT/IDLE
: 5.0 MT VLSFO WHEN CRANES WORKING
: 0.1 MT LSMGO AT SEA/PORT
ALL DETS ABT
+++
MV PAGODA
28,227 MTS DWAT AT 9,81M SSW
29,417 MTS DWAT AT 10,118M TIMBER SUMMER
IMABARI 2013, FULLY FITTED LOGGER/BULK CARRIER
LIBERIA FLAG, CLASS NK
LOA 169.37M / BEAM 27.20M - 5 HO/HA
GRT 16,991 / NRT 10,154
GRAIN / BALE CAP 37,320/35,742 CBM
4 X 30.5 TONS CRANES
CO2/A60 FITTED
S/C      : 13.5KTS(B)/13.0KTS(L) ON 20.0(B)/20.0(L) MTS VLSFO
ECO (WOG): 12.0KTS(B)/11.5KTS(L) ON 16.0(B)/16.0(L) MTS VLSFO
: 2.5 MT VLSFO AT PORT/IDLE
: 5.0 MT VLSFO WHEN CRANES WORKING
: 0.1 MT LSMGO AT SEA/PORT
ALL DETS ABT
thanks & regards
George Lemos
